DOC.brief_summary: We design randomize , double- blind , single-center study compare efficacy combination dexamethasone ondansetron dexamethasone dimenhydrinate undergoing plastic surgery .
DOC.detailed_description: A total 60 voman patient , ASA status I-II , age 18-65 year schedule elective rhinoplasty enrol study . Exclusion criterias hypersensitivity contraindication study medication , receive antiemetic drug steroid within 24 hour anesthesia , history diabetes history motion sickness ( MS ) PONV , pregnant lactating female . Patients informed use patient control analgesia device postoperative period . The risk criterias PONV record patient.Patients randomly assign two study group 30 patient . All patient premedicated intravenous ( iv ) midazolam ( 1-2 mg ) . On arrival operating room , standard anesthetic monitor apply . Anesthesia induce iv propofol ( 2-3 mg/kg ) fentanyl ( 1-1.5 μg/kg ) . Tracheal intubation facilitate rocuronium ( 0.6 mg/kg ) . After tracheal intubation patient receive iv 8 mg dexamethasone . Normocapnic mechanical ventilation perform intubation . General anesthesia maintain sevoflurane ( 1 minimum alveolar concentration ) oxygen / air mixture remifentanil ( 0.1-0.3 μg/kg/min ) infusion.Four mg ondansetron patient 1 mg/kg dimenhydrinate 5 ml syringe solution prepare pharmacy department , give blind investigator . The patient , anesthesiologist ( exception primary author ) , statistician , observe blind . Dimenhydrinate administer group DD ( 1mg/kg ) , ondansetron administer group DO ( 4mg ) , patient receive tramadol ( 1.5mg/kg ) tenoksikam ( 20mg ) half hour emergence . Postoperative analgesia provide patient control analgesia system use iv tramadol ( 5mg/mL ) ( 2 ml bolus 10 minute lockout interval without basal infusion ) . After surgery , muscle relaxation reverse administer neostigmine ( 0.05mg/kg ) atropine ( 0.015mg/kg ) . Patients extubated transferred recovery unit .
